Robotic-Arm
This project is a robotic arm with 6 degrees of freedom (DoF) controlled wirelessly via a custom mobile application. It allows users to control the arm's movement in real-time using a smartphone or tablet. This project is ideal for hobbyists and educators interested in robotics and embedded systems.

e-ChallanX
E-ChallanX is a digital solution for efficient traffic violation challan management. The platform provides a user-friendly interface for drivers to view their outstanding challans, pay fines online, and challenge unjust challans. The system uses AI cameras and traffic police to issue challans, which are recorded on a centralized server.
